content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials** japanese size 4/0 2 5 mm crochet hook **additional gauge information** there are three gauges listed in the pattern as follows * pattern stitch a 模様編みａ 25 5st/13rows in 10x10cm square * pattern stitch b 模様編みｂ 22 5st/6 5rows in 10x10cm square * pattern stitch c 模様編みｃ 17 5st/5rows in 10x10cm square 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-29-4/
